'''Radiant Spincrystal 149''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

In order to obtain [[Radiant Spincrystal 148]], [[Radiant Spincrystal 149]], and [[Radiant Spincrystal 150]], the player needs to speak to [[Kulemana]] and complete her [[Time Trial Challenge]] of collecting 15 buoy data. After completion, the player can freely take the 3 spincrystals from the table.
